title: The study of elementary particle physics and their interactions - additonal capital equipment CMS
abstractText:
To provide additional state of the art instrumentation to monitor the beam conditions and instantaneous radiation levels in CMS to protect the sensitive tracking detectors.

To provide part of the required readout system to evaluate options for CMS Forward Calorimetry at the HL-LHC.
findingsText: Not yet time for outcomes Too soon to say Education,Electronics
